titles.title: Veterans Choice Card Prompt Payment Act

A bill to modify the requirements of the Department of Veterans Affairs for reimbursing health care providers under section 101 of the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014, and for other purposes.
Veterans Choice Card Prompt Payment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Veterans Choice Card Prompt Payment Act
This bill amends the Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014 to require the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), upon receipt of a request from a non-VA entity for reimbursement for health care services provided to a veteran under the Veterans Choice Program, to reimburse the entity even if the request does not include the veteran's medical records.
